TopicTitle: Need your own thread moved or locked? Post here.

Articles.Content:
Would like to ask to get a poll removed from my mod thread!

Link in sig.

Done.

Could someone remove the Poll from my companies thread? Link is my sig pic

And done.

Just want to point out that the thread below is in the wrong section. He is not a rocket company himself, he is asking others to post images and crafts of kraken drives. Should probably be in the spacecraft exchange

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128542-Kraken-Experimental

Just as a matter of etiquette, the purpose of this thread is to ask the moderators to do something without your own threads. If you think someone else's thread has a problem, please hit the report button on it. This spares the OP the embarrassment of being called out in public.
oh right sorry
Whoops, sorry.
No probs. It's just nicer that way.

(look like i missed some necromoaning related post lately, not that i m aware on this specific subject but ... xDr cheers ; )

Edited July 17, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''
oops wrong thread posting anyway fit to this one also nevermind ; )

Hello there Mods.

Could any of you remove the poll from my GIS-Octopus thread linked in my sig.

Thank you
DYJ got it for you, Cyriak.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128996-This-new-atmosphere-sucks%21

Close or delete this now! I've made a stupid mistake by posting this! PLEASE CLOSE IT I BEG OF YOU!

Got it, Kaboom!

(Your name is perfect for ending sentences with. )

Got it, Kaboom!

(Your name is perfect for ending sentences with. )

You are the best mod ever.

Close it please.
Done.

This please, I need to restart it differently

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120187-C7-Aerospace-Division
Locked up for you, legoclone09.

I've just stumbled across the "Live from Mission Control" sub-forum.

Can someone move [thread=125339]my video series thread[/thread] there please. It should have the tag as well, not .

Will it keep the same thread number thing and URL, or will I have to edit my signature?

Also, why do Sal & RIC appear to have no rep?

Edited July 20, 2015 by TheMoonRover

Moved and retagged for you, TheMoonRover.

Sal and I have both turned off rep display in our profiles. See here.

Hi Mods,

Is it possible to have someone add a Comment in big letters to the OP of this thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62941

to point to my more up to date thread here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111157

Saying something like this thread is not being maintained by Tobyb121 any more. Please go to this thread for up to date versions and support..

or words to that effect.

Thanks muchly.

JPLRepo

It would be preferred that you message Toby121 about this and get them to do it, or request it, or if you have a link to a post about abandoning this made by the OP

Hi Mods,

Is it possible to have someone add a Comment in big letters to the OP of this thread:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/62941

to point to my more up to date thread here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111157

Saying something like this thread is not being maintained by Tobyb121 any more. Please go to this thread for up to date versions and support..

or words to that effect.

Thanks muchly.

JPLRepo

It would be preferred that you message Toby121 about this and get them to do it, or request it, or if you have a link to a post about abandoning this made by the OP

Yeah ok. thought as much. No I have no message of him abandoning it.. I have sent him pull requests on the source code on github. I have PM'd him back like in Jan this year? and noticed that until very recently (like a couple of weeks ago) that he/she had not logged onto the forums since last year. But suddenly they did earlier this month. But they did not respond to any of my previous communications. I have again sent them another PM.

That's ok, never mind. If people can't read the 20 posts I have already done in that thread saying come to my thread for the latest support. Well, guess that's too bad for them.

Cheers.
